description: This file provides a set of centralized animation helper functions for a React Native application, including press scaling, fade-in, pop-in, pulse, and haptic feedback utilities.

methods.name: pressScale
methods.description: Creates a subtle scale press animation with styles and handlers for press in and out events.

methods.name: fadeIn
methods.description: Provides a fade-in style and start function for opacity transitions.

methods.name: popIn
methods.description: Creates a pop-in animation with scaling and opacity for appearing effects.

methods.name: pulse
methods.description: Returns a pulsating animation loop for highlighting borders or elements.

methods.name: hapticLight
methods.description: Stub for minimal haptic feedback; currently a no-op but designed for platform-specific haptic effects.
